dict.string: QDirStat needs access to your Desktop to scan for disk usage.
QDirStat needs access to your Documents folder to scan for disk usage.
QDirStat needs access to your Downloads folder to scan for disk usage.
QDirStat needs access to file providers to scan for disk usage.
QDirStat needs access to your Movies folder to scan for disk usage.
QDirStat needs access to your Music folder to scan for disk usage.
QDirStat needs access to your Pictures folder to scan for disk usage.
QDirStat needs access to removable volumes to scan for disk usage.
QDirStat needs access to network volumes to scan for disk usage.
